name: Big Tech IPO
effect: If you win a dispute, gain +1 GDP immediately.
flavor: Click to accept terms and conditions… on global dominance.

name: Bailout Bill
effect: If you would lose an Export, instead pay 2 GDP to keep it.
flavor: Too big to fail, too small to pay taxes.

name: Dollar Hegemony
effect: Once per round, convert 1 Influence into +1 GDP.
flavor: In God we trust. Everyone else pays fees.

name: Patent Troll Army
effect: Opponents pay +1 GDP to play Policies.

name: Trade Sanctions
effect: Choose one opponent; they lose 2 GDP.
flavor: You're sanctioned, you're sanctioned — everybody's sanctioned!

name: Shock and Audit
effect: Destroy one Policy in play. Gain +2 GDP.
flavor: Freedom is best served with paperwork.
